hero.text_1: So remember Me; I will remember you. And be grateful to Me and do not deny Me.
hero.text_2: O you who believe, seek help through patience and prayer. Indeed, Allah is with the patient.
hero.text_3: And if you count the favors of Allah, you will never be able to number them. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
hero.text_4: And whoever fears Allah—He will make for him a way out, and will provide for him from where he does not expect.
hero.text_5: Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him and those who do good.
hero.text_6: And whoever relies upon Allah, then He is sufficient for him.
hero.text_7: Say: Nothing will happen to us except what Allah has written for us. He is our Protector.
hero.text_8: Allah does not burden a soul beyond what it can bear.
hero.text_9: Those who believe and whose hearts find rest in the remembrance of Allah. Verily, in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.
hero.text_10: It may be that you dislike something while it is good for you.
hero.text_11: Indeed, with hardship comes ease. Indeed, with hardship comes ease.
hero.text_12: And He is with you wherever you are.
hero.text_13: My success is only by Allah. In Him I trust.
hero.text_14: For indeed, with hardship comes ease.
hero.text_15: And say: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.
hero.text_16: So remind, for indeed reminding benefits the believers.
hero.text_17: Indeed, my Lord is near and responsive.
hero.text_18: And upon Allah rely, if you are believers.
hero.text_19: Call upon Me; I will respond to you.
hero.text_20: Indeed, whoever fears Allah and is patient—Allah does not allow the reward of the doers of good to be lost.
